archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0827
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Fraud Manager I need an effective case management tool which will pull data from customer systems to save duplicating information we already have

properties.value: This could be Comarch case management system, but then for HLD phase it would be good to receive some details like number of flows, their complexity, possible integrations, etc. To be delivered by VF.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
